mapper.select:
SELECT L_NO, L_SUBJECT, L_ADDR, L_CONTENT, L_REP_IMG, L_ENABLE, L_PAYMENT, TO_CHAR(L_SDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS L_SDATE, TO_CHAR(L_EDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS L_EDATE, L_RATE FROM LENDPLACE
(L_SUBJECT like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or L_CONTENT like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%')
AND REGEXP_LIKE(L_ADDR,#{searchAddr})
AND ((L_PAYMENT >= #{min_pay} and #{max_pay} >= L_PAYMENT))
AND ((L_SDATE >= #{l_sdate} and #{l_edate} >= L_EDATE))
ORDER BY L_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LENDPLACE ( L_NO, L_SUBJECT, L_ADDR, L_CONTENT, L_ENABLE, L_PAYMENT, L_SDATE, L_EDATE ) VALUES ( LENDPLACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{L_SUBJECT}, #{L_ADDR}, #{L_CONTENT}, #{L_ENABLE}, #{L_PAYMENT}, #{L_SDATE}, #{L_EDATE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE LENDPLACE SET L_SUBJECT = #{L_SUBJECT}, L_CONTENT = #{L_CONTENT}, L_REP_IMG = #{L_REP_IMG}, L_ENABLE = #{L_ENABLE}, L_PAYMENT = #{L_PAYMENT} WHERE L_NO = #{L_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACEBOOK ( PB_NO, L_NO, M_NO, PB_DATE ) VALUES ( PLACEBOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{L_NO}, #{M_NO}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO REVIEW ( R_NO, R_CONTENT, R_RATING, R_DATE, L_NO, M_NO ) VALUES ( REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{R_CONTENT}, #{R_RATING}, #{R_DATE}, #{L_NO}, #{M_NO} )
